 2024-09772024-08-28PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARIE-GENEVIÈVE MOUNIER of Montréal, Quebec, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARIE-GENEVIÈVE MOUNIER of Montréal, Quebec, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
